```{r setup}
library(linearAlgebra)
```

```{r}
x <- matrix(c("a", "b", "b", "c"), ncol = 2)
colnames(x) <- rownames(x) <- c("v1", "v2")
```

## Vectorize

```{r}
vec(x)
```

## Half-Vectorize

```{r}
vech(x)
```

## Strict Half-Vectorize

```{r}
vechs(x)
```

## Names for Half-Vectorization

```{r}
vechnames(colnames(x))
```

## Names for Strict Half-Vectorization

```{r}
vechsnames(colnames(x))
```
